channel.title: Players online
channel.description: is there a way to edit the players online to make it more than what it is? i've tried removing the method and editing it, nothing is working. would it be client sided?

item.title: Players online
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Not sure if troll…

Anyways, if you’re not trolling, it would be unethical to do this. By doing so, you are lying to the players and community.

However, all you would need to do to accomplish this is simply identify all of the references to the current number of players, find which one gets sent to the clients, and then add a number to it.

No, I will not show you the code.

Read full topic

item.title: Players online
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“xneonx, post:4, topic:437199”][quote author=adamgulka link=topic=539912.msg3952973#msg3952973 date=1332464759]

What do you mean? Are you meaning to allow your server to hold more people?

i think he means like say tehres 12 people online he wants it to say that theres 27 people online… so his server looks busyer, thats what I think he means
[/quote]
That’s what I was also thinking but was wondering why would you want this? [/quote]

To generate the false appearance of a popular server?

Read full topic
